AppDB.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents the CRPS engine configuration

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_SCAN_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table reprsents the CRPS engine scan (eviction) configuration

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_ENABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table initiate and enable the engine activity

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ITM_INTERFACE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the crps interface adapter for CGM source

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ITM_INT_STAT_PTR_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the mapping from ingress voq to object stat id

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ETM_INTERFACE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table enable/disable the counter pointer from Egress TM queues (EGQ)

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ITPP_INTERFACE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the crps interface adapter for ITPP source

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ERPP_INTERFACE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the crps interface adapter for ERPP source

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ETPP_INTERFACE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the crps interface adapter for ETPP source

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ETPP_LATENCY_CTR_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table should select if to use etpp latency counter or packet size counter

AppDB.Name: CRPS_IRPP_INTERFACE_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the crps interface adapter for IRPP source

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ENGINE_TYPE_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the object-type-addmission and Object-Type-Offset of the engine. (per type)

AppDB.Name: CRPS_EXPANSION_DATA_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the expansion mapping per engine

AppDB.Name: CRPS_ETPP_COUNTER_DATA_SELECTION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configure the format of the 24 bits meta data that etpp generates

AppDB.Name: CRPS_LAST_COMMAND
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table gives the last command sent into the counter processor

AppDB.Name: CRPS_INGRESS_COMPENSATION_MASKS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table sets Ingress compensation masks

AppDB.Name: CRPS_IRPP_COMPENSATION_SELECT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table sets Ingress compensation selected mask

AppDB.Name: CRPS_OVERFLOW_COUNTER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table gives the overflow counter mode

AppDB.Name: CRPS_IRPP_FILTER_MASK
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table gives the filter reject groups per command id for IRPP>

AppDB.Name: CRPS_TM_FILTER_MASK
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table gives the filter reject groups per command id for TM>

AppDB.Name: CRPS_METER_SMALL_ENGINE_SHARED_MEM
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table should describe the source of each memory in HW DB_A (small engines) bank in the shared memory.

AppDB.Name: CRPS_METER_BIG_ENGINE_SHARED_MEM
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The following table should describe the source of each memory in HW DB_C (big engines) bank in the shared memory.

AppDB.Name: CRPS_OAM_DUMMY_REPLY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table configures the dummy reply sent from the counter processor to the OAM in case the OAM is stuck

AppDB.Name: CRPS_LAST_INPUT_COMMAND
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table gives the last received command for a given source

Field.Description: Enabling the last received command debug register
Field.Name: ENABLE

Field.Description: Configure the Interface to return the last received command
Field.Name: INTERFACE_ID

Field.Description: Last received command read (1 for read, 0 for write)
Field.Name: READ_WRITE

Field.Description: Last received command packet size or queue size
Field.Name: PKT_OR_QUEUE_SIZE

AppDB.Name: CRPS_CONDITIONAL_EVICTION_CFG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table represents the CRPS condional eviction action configuration
